page.title: 14Garway Church Graveyard
page.content: We collected information from the gravestones at Garway Church. We wrote down the names and dates of 85 people. There are some more gravestones, but we could not get at them because the grass was too long, and they are badly worn down. Usually there are two or three names on a gravestone. Though the church is Norman, the earliest date we found was 1764. There were three 18th century dates, 24 from the 19th century, and the rest from this century. The oldest person lived to be 95. There were 7 graves of children. The most common surname was Morgan, with 17, though none since 1907. There were 7 Barrells and 7 Benjamins. Both those names are very common in the village now.
